original_text: They will not have enough food or water. Everyone will be very upset. Their bodies will become very thin when I punish them for their sins.’
korean_text: 떡과 물이 부족하여 피차에 두려워 하여 떨며 그 죄악 중에서 쇠패하리라

sentences.original_text: They will not have enough food
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 충분한 음식을 갖지 못할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Their bodies will become very thin
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 몸은 매우 마르게 될 것입니다
